Option D, "central," lacks context in relation to plumbing or the action you would take with a plumber.
Option E, "oil refineries," is again unrelated; oil refineries deal with petroleum engineering, not plumbing.
After analyzing all options, there doesn't seem to be a direct connection to actions one would take with a plumber from the available choices.
